declined.authentication_required: The card was declined as the transaction requires authentication.
declined.call_issuer: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.card_not_supported: The card does not support this type of purchase.
declined.currency_not_supported: The card does not support EUR currency.
declined.do_not_honor: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.do_not_try_again: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.duplicate_transaction: A transaction with identical amount and credit card information was submitted very recently.
declined.fraudulent: The payment has been declined as Stripe suspects it is fraudulent.
declined.generic_decline: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.incorrect_pin: The PIN entered is incorrect. This decline code only applies to payments made with a card reader.
declined.insufficient_funds: The card has insufficient funds to complete the purchase.
declined.invalid_account: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid.
declined.invalid_amount: The payment amount is invalid, or exceeds the amount that is allowed.
declined.invalid_pin: The PIN entered is incorrect. This decline code only applies to payments made with a card reader.
declined.issuer_not_available: The card issuer could not be reached, so the payment could not be authorized.
declined.lost_card: The payment has been declined because the card is reported lost.
declined.merchant_blacklist: The payment has been declined because it matches a value on the Stripe userâ€™s block list.
declined.new_account_information_available: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid.
declined.no_action_taken: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.offline_pin_required: The card has been declined as it requires a PIN.
declined.pickup_card: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
declined.pin_try_exceeded: The allowable number of PIN tries has been exceeded.
declined.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card.
declined.reenter_transaction: The payment could not be processed by the issuer for an unknown reason.
declined.restricted_card: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
declined.revocation_of_all_authorizations: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.revocation_of_authorization: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.security_violation: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.service_not_allowed: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.stolen_card: The payment has been declined because the card is reported stolen.
declined.stop_payment_order: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.testmode_decline: A Stripe test card number was used.
declined.transaction_not_allowed: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.try_again_later: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
declined.withdrawal_count_limit_exceeded: The customer has exceeded the balance or credit limit available on their card.
